Blog.post: Oh how glad I shall be When I finally graduate. The day that I have waited for for 7years is right around the corner. Thank God

I just happy sey na Friday again. I fit rest again. I vex yesterday. I dey thinksey I go fit see OBJ on top TV. But I know see am. One person dey use am laugh sey when all him other friends put on ordinary shirt, Baba put on him agbada inside the hot weather. I still dey wonder why him dey do dis way. I no understand how dem increase fuel price. I hear sey for Iraq na 5cents per litre. So why our own come different. God go help us.

Wonders will never end. I just dey listen to news this morning and I hear sey J. Lo don marry again. Dis sisi no go let us rest at all. Last year, na Bennifer every where. We think sey she go let us rest. But Jennifer don come back sha. We just dey count how many days before dis marriage dabaru again. Yes, Smarty Jones lose the Tripple Crown bid. For my life, I never watch horse racign till dis Saturday when everybody dey shout "Smarty JOnes". Me gan I get the "Smarty Jones" fever. I no know how house go con become celebrity like dis Smarty Jones. And e no con win the race. Olose ni esin yi o. I don forget the last point I won make sef.

I am back to work on the project this morning. I am yet to made any headway today. I hope to make a lot of progress today. I was just readign about Nigeria's match with Rwanda Tomorrow. I should think we will round them up and beat them silly. After almost one week. I chop for morning. My stomach no like am at all. Na beg I dey una. Make una dey eat o. Let me get back to work on my project. I should make progress today. Abeg make people write to me now. I go just call OPC for una.
I thought I would be able to complete this application today. But the thing mess me up sha. I go just injure dis thing now. I no think sey the program know sey I be omo-naija sha.

I just heard about the decision of the craziest governor in the world - Ahmed Sani of Zamfara State, Nigeria to demolish all churches. Indeed this man is an anti-Christ. He must be dealt with as one. I am amazed at the fact that this man has been allowed to continue in office and continue to perpetuate these undemocratic, demonic and unconstitutional acts. The press are not pounding on this man and the president and all the law makers have allowed him to continue. This is a shame to democracy and the Nigerian press. It is a big shame to all those who claim to promote democracy in Nigeria. How can this be allowed to continue. God help us.

Men, I did not know that elections here can be so nasty. I find it very interesting that these 2 grown men will attack each other - especially Bush. I never hear am say wetin im go do. Na only talk about how im opponent - Kerry never do anything. Dem suppose be ashamed. I was just thinking last week about how they always celebrate achievements. I think that is a main difference between us Naija and these Oyinbo. If a Naija man do anything remarkable, everybody go dey jealous am. Na talk about how na luck people go dey talk. Bu did Oyinbo people, dem no go stop celebrating that person even horse sef. Imagine how dem dey celebrate Smarty Jones and now Armstrong. I gast to go. Enjoy
